segments.text: Looking at this scene, my heart sinks a bit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, just polishing that plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the sink edge, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so precarious, arm stretched high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If it tips, he'll fall hard with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly reaching up, eyes on the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how innocent their mischief is amid the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a serene garden, but inside it's chaos waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting ruined by the water flow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, this could turn into a real mess emotionally.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel in her hand seems so mundane now.
segments.speaker: PAR
